amendment.description: To provide full funding for the individuals with Disabilities Education Act (IDEA) part B grants over ten years by reducing tax breaks for the wealthiest tax payers.

vote.text: Amendment SA 376 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 47 - 52. Record Vote Number: 70.

action.text: Amendment SA 376 proposed by Senator Conrad. (consideration: CR S4235-4236; text: CR S4235-4236) To provide full funding for the individuals with Disabilities Education Act (IDEA) part B grants over ten years by reducing tax breaks for the wealthiest tax payers.
Senate amendment not agreed to: Amendment SA 376 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 47 - 52. Record Vote Number: 70.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 376 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 47 - 52. Record Vote Number: 70.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 376 proposed by Senator Conrad.
